Trade/Device Name(s): Alere Signify® H. pylori – Whole Blood, Serum, Plasma
Alere Signify® H. pylori – Whole Blood Only
Alere Clearview® H. pylori – Whole Blood, Serum, Plasma
Alere Clearview® H. pylori – Whole Blood Only
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Alere Signify and Clearview rapid lateral flow immunoassay cassette tests for qualitative detection of H. pylori IgG antibodies in blood, serum, or plasma
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative detection of IgG antibodies to Helicobacter pylori in whole blood, serum or plasma to aid in the diagnosis of H. pylori infection in adults 18 years and older
